column1: '''Houghton Mifflin Harcourt''', formerly known as '''Houghton Mifflin''', holds the right for publishing works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] in the United States. [[Harper Collins]] is the European publisher.
On January 16th, 2001, Houghton Mifflin [http://www.tolkien-movies.com/words/2001/01-16-01e.shtml announced] they had acquired rights to publish books based on [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)

column2: April 17]], [[2007]] - [[The Children of Húrin]] is released.
May 16]], [[2007]] - [[The Children of Húrin]] Deluxe Edition is released.
